# UIActivityCollaborationMode

**Enumeration**

A value that defines how the system shares an item.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIActivityCollaborationMode
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **UIActivityCollaborationMode.collaborate**: The system allows collaboration on a shared item.
- **UIActivityCollaborationMode.sendCopy**: The system sends a copy of the item.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Restricting the sharing mode

- **UIActivityViewController.CollaborationModeRestriction**: An object that disables the sharing mode and optionally displays an alert.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
